DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if it is safe and effective to give delavirdine mesylate (Rescriptor) plus two nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NRTIs) to HIV-infected children and babies. This study also examines how the body processes Rescriptor when taken with 2 NRTIs.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Delavirdine Mesylate in Combination With Other Anti-HIV Drugs in HIV-Infected Children and Babies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must have: HIV infection. Plasma HIV1 levels greater than 10,000 copies/ml.
